title: Essence
content:
Essence could refer to:

  • Rune essence, mined at the rune essence mine at below level 30 Mining.
  • Pure essence, mined at the rune essence mine at level 30 Mining or above.
  • The Rune Essence Mine, accessible after the Rune Mysteries quest.
  • Essence impling, an impling caught with at least level 42 in Hunter.
  • Essence impling jar, the lootable item obtained as a result of catching an essence impling.
  • Magic essence, a potion that can be made during and after Fairy Tale II - Cure a Queen.
  • Daeyalt essence, created by trading in daeyalt shards mined at the Daeyalt Essence Mine.
  • The Daeyalt Essence Mine, accessible after the Sins of the Father quest.
  • Blood essence, an item dropped by all NPCs in the Ancient Prison.
 This page is used to distinguish between articles with similar names.
If an internal link led you to this disambiguation page, you may wish to change the link to point directly to the intended article.
rawContent:
'''Essence''' could refer to:
*[[Rune essence]], mined at the rune essence mine at below level 30 Mining.
*[[Pure essence]], mined at the rune essence mine at level 30 Mining or above.
*The [[Rune Essence Mine]], accessible after the [[Rune Mysteries]] quest.
*[[Essence impling]], an impling caught with at least level 42 in Hunter.
*[[Essence impling jar]], the lootable item obtained as a result of catching an essence impling.
*[[Magic essence]], a potion that can be made during and after [[Fairy Tale II - Cure a Queen]].
*[[Daeyalt essence]], created by trading in [[Daeyalt shard|daeyalt shards]] mined at the [[Daeyalt essence mine|Daeyalt Essence Mine]].
*The [[Daeyalt essence mine|Daeyalt Essence Mine]], accessible after the [[Sins of the Father]] quest.
*[[Blood essence]], an item dropped by all NPCs in the [[Ancient Prison]].
{{Disambig}}
